author: James Walker
title: Rep. Dan Crenshaw Says China Has 'Wronged' Americans And Will Be Sued Over Coronavirus Response
description: The GOP congressman also accused Chinese authorities of spreading "false talking points" about the virus earlier this year.
content:
Republican congressman Dan Crenshaw said the United States has been "wronged" by China's reaction to the COVID-19 outbreak and would sue the country for damages.
The Texas representative told Fox News on Monday night that Americans would "find somebody to su… [+5637 chars]
